A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There's a lot of condescending comments being thrown around that people who didn't like this movie just can't accept 'the new direction' taken with TLJ and are stuck in the past of traditional Star Wars films.

This as a Star Wars movie is the weakest of the bunch apart from Attack of the Clones and as a standalone movie\, average at best.

A fruitless plot\, forced audience pandering humour and slapstick characters condemn what should have been an epic ending to one of the greatest characters in movie history.
